LanguageData.Disease_MutagenicDisease.letterText:
{0} of your {1} have gotten sick from {2}.

Ensure you have mutagen stabiliser, or you may end up with your pawns being significantly more animal.

The following {1} have gotten sick:

{3}
LanguageData.Disease_MutagenicDisease.label: mutagenic disease
LanguageData.MutagenicShipPartCrash.label: ship part crash (mutagenic)
LanguageData.MutagenicShipPartCrash.letterText:
A large piece of an ancient ship has crashed nearby.

It's mysterious influence will kill all plants in an expanding circle around itself, and mutate any pawns and animals that get too close.

Destroy it as soon as possible. But beware - it will probably defend itself.
LanguageData.MutagenicFallout.label: mutagenic fallout
LanguageData.PM_SheepChef.label: A ram approaches...
LanguageData.ChaomorphPasses.label: Chaomorphs pass
